== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&CenterDot;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00b7/index.htm U+000B7].
  * `&centerdot;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00b7/index.htm U+000B7].
